WRITING.TITLE: This fat girl came on to me in a club..
WRITING.TEXT:
Im out to get pissed and have a good time, Ive left the kids and my other half at home, She said,
Fuck me, I replied, just how big are you?

WRITING.TITLE: Ive just joined the Flat Earth Society.
WRITING.TEXT: We have members around the globe. (credit https://thejokecafe.com )

WRITING.TITLE: Whats the smallest unit of time in the known universe?
WRITING.TEXT: The interval between the traffic light changing to green and the taxi driver behind you honking his horn.

WRITING.TITLE: Our family surname is Daniels
WRITING.TEXT:
So rather hilariously we named our first child Jack.
She hates it.
People in North Korea who have the same name as Kim Jong Un are being ordered to change their name. Now everyone has the choice of either Khloe or Kourtney Jong Un. Thats your choice.
I dont like sexist jokes . Theyre too complicated for women.

A woman walks into a bar. Why the long face? Asks the barman.
An hour and a half later, he was regretting it.
The Chicken is offended that even after all the jokes, the crossing on the road is still named after a Zebra.
I just changed my Facebook password to 14 days but it said it was also Too weak'
